name: Salted Caramel Mango Madness
description: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend and sweet mango add a playful sweetness to this uber green smoothie. It works well with any type of milk â€“ be sure to choose an unsweetened or plain, plant-based milk.

ingredients.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation:
1. In a blender, add ice cubes, spinach, milk, mango, and protein blend.
  2. Cover and blend until smooth; add more milk as needed to reach desired consistency. Pour into chilled glasses.
tips: For a frosty glass, rinse glass with cold water and then freeze at least 30 min.
